text: tomalokara bisayata (sihamtara sahaya pradana arau bijaya kamanata) krpanata karaara karane. Eteke yetiya bhiti (bipada) ahiba tetiya tumi dekhiba, sihamte mrtyura bhayata murccha yoraa byaktira darae caku olota'i tomara pine thara lagi ca'i ache. Kintu yetiya bipada amtarai yaya tetiya sihamte dhanara lalasata tomalokaka tiksna bhasata bid'dha karae. Sihamte imana ana na'i phalata allahe sihamtara amalasamuha nisphala karaiche arau e'ito allahara babe ati sahaja
